mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mini_market_qna_board_member( member_unique_no, qna_board_member_title, qna_board_member_content, qna_board_member_date ) VALUE( #{memberUniqueNo}, #{qnaBoardMemberTitle}, #{qnaBoardMemberContent}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT qna_board_member_no AS qnaBoardMemberNo, m.member_nickname AS memberUniqueNo, qna_board_member_title AS qnaBoardMemberTitle, qna_board_member_content AS qnaBoardMemberContent, qna_board_member_date AS qnaBoardMemberDate FROM mini_market_qna_board_member q INNER join mini_market_member m on q.member_unique_no = m.member_unique_no WHERE qna_board_member_no = #{qnaBoardMemberNo}

SELECT qna_board_member_no AS qnaBoardMemberNo, member_unique_no AS memberUniqueNo, qna_board_member_title AS qnaBoardMemberTitle, qna_board_member_content AS qnaBoardMemberContent, qna_board_member_date AS qnaBoardMemberDate FROM mini_market_qna_board_member ORDER BY qna_board_member_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow} , #{rowPerPage}
